mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(sum(people_num),0) FROM activity_order WHERE activity_id = #{activeId}

SELECT a.order_id, a.store_name, a.name, a.mobile, a.address, a.store_name, a.activity_time, w.nick_name, w.avatar_url FROM activity_order a LEFT JOIN wechat_info w ON a.open_id = w.open_id
and a.activity_id = #{activeId}
and a.store_name like '%${province}%'
and a.store_name like '%${city}%'
and a.store_name like '%${area}%'
and a.store_name like '%${storeName}%'
limit #{start}, #{num}
